lb
**


Description
===========

CLI for the Load Balancing service. Use this CLI to manage load
balancers, backend sets, and related items. For more information, see
Overview of Load Balancing.


Available Commands
==================

* backend

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* backend-health

  * get

* backend-set

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* backend-set-health

  * get

* certificate

  * create

  * delete

  * list

* health-checker

  * get

  * update

* hostname

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* listener

  * create

  * delete

  * update

* listener-rule

  * list

* load-balancer

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

  * update-load-balancer-shape

* load-balancer-health

  * get

  * list

* nsg

  * update

* path-route-set

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* policy

  * list

* protocol

  * list

* routing-policy

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* rule-set

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* shape

  * list

* ssl-cipher-suite

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list
